resources.string: Controls the accent color. Takes effect when you leave this page
Controls the background color. Takes effect when you leave this page
Do you want to add a link to JMusic that matches your current theme to your launcher?
Album artwork and other data will be always be downloaded
Album artwork and other data will only be downloaded on Wi-Fi networks
Help make JMusic better by sending anonymous usage data
Anonymous usage data and crash information will be sent to Marverenic
Only anonymous crash information will be sent to Marverenic

It looks like you have another app that manages audio effects. This may cause problems with JMusic's equalizer, so be prepared to turn this off if you notice unexpected behavior. 

To use the global equalizer, disable JMusic's equalizer and tap Equalizer in the settings page. 
To return to this page, tap and hold Equalizer in the settings page.
